Bio: 3 Point Landing is a band from Alkmaar, Netherlands, known for their energetic performances and engaging music. They have achieved recognition through contests like the Rob Acda Award and Popmania band contest, and have performed alongside notable acts such as YUNGBLUD.
AI Summary: 3 Point Landing delivers high-energy performances and engaging music, blending rock and alternative influences. Their recognition in contests like the Rob Acda Award and Popmania highlights their growing reputation, and performing alongside YUNGBLUD suggests a dynamic and contemporary style.
Festival Bio (NL): Gothic synth rockers 3 POINT LANDING staan al een tijd bovenaan de Alkmaarse muziek scene, met een rijtje lokale en regionale verdiensten (Mixtream, Popmania, runner-up Rob Acda Award) om je vingers bij af te likken. Wordt 2026 dan toch echt hun jaar? Dan ben jij er in januari alvast vroeg bij :)

Bio: Black Operator is a music act known for their energetic single 'Revolution' and their debut album, both available on streaming platforms. They actively engage with fans through their music videos and social media presence.
AI Summary: Black Operator delivers high-energy music, as showcased in their single 'Revolution' and debut album. Their focus on connecting with fans through music videos and social media highlights their commitment to creating an engaging and interactive experience.

Tagline: Raw emotions wrapped in indie pop.
Bio: Carmen De Kooning is a 20-year-old indie pop artist from the Netherlands, creating emotional and heartfelt songs in both English and Dutch. Drawing from personal experiences and mental battles, Carmen aims to comfort listeners and share relatable, inspiring music.
AI Summary: Carmen De Kooning crafts deeply emotional indie pop songs that resonate with listeners through their heartfelt lyrics and bilingual approach, offering a unique blend of English and Dutch storytelling. Her music reflects personal struggles and aims to provide solace and inspiration.

Bio: Days of Sway is a band performing live music at various venues and festivals across the Netherlands. Known for their engaging performances, they have shared stages with acts like The Skill, A Sudden Collision, Trashwood, and Glitz.
AI Summary: Days of Sway is a Netherlands-based band known for their dynamic and engaging live performances. Their ability to captivate audiences has earned them opportunities to share stages with other notable acts like The Skill and A Sudden Collision, suggesting a strong presence in the local live music scene.

Bio: Dear John is a singer-songwriter from Alkmaar who creates honest songs with a rhythmic acoustic sound influenced by folk-pop, soul, and Americana. With over 15 years of stage experience, his intimate and authentic performances are known for their uplifting energy and heartfelt storytelling.
AI Summary: Dear John delivers a heartfelt blend of folk-pop, soul, and Americana, characterized by rhythmic acoustic sounds and authentic storytelling. With over 15 years of stage experience, his performances are both intimate and uplifting, showcasing his ability to connect with audiences through emotional resonance and energy.
Festival Bio (NL): De songs van DEAR JOHN zijn nodige zonnestraaltjes in de grauwe december/januari lucht. Gewapend met alleen zijn glimlach en gitaar brengt singer songwriter Dirk-Jan Smit zijn persoonlijke en uplifting repertoire, geïnspireerd door Jason Mraz en Jack Johnnson.

Bio: Dress Up Dolls is an alternative rock trio from Alkmaar, Netherlands, featuring Yoram van der Reep on drums, Aris Rem on bass, and Daan Stam on vocals. Known for their powerful sound and energetic live performances, the band gained recognition in the Dutch music scene after winning the Rob Acda Award. They have played at major festivals such as Bevrijdingspop and NH-Pop Live, and their style draws comparisons to acts like Muse and Radiohead. In December 2025, Dress Up Dolls marked their reunion by performing new material at Alkmaars Eigenste Festival, signaling an exciting new chapter for the band.
AI Summary: Dress Up Dolls is a dynamic alternative rock trio from the Netherlands, celebrated for their high-energy live shows and a sound reminiscent of Muse and Radiohead. Their recognition in the Dutch music scene, bolstered by winning the Rob Acda Award and performances at major festivals, highlights their artistic credibility and audience appeal. Their 2025 reunion signals a promising continuation of their impactful musical journey.
Festival Bio (NL): DRESS UP DOLLS heeft ondertussen een veteranen status op AE, maar toch voelt een optreden van de heren een beetje als een come back. Na een kleine pauze zijn ze gelukkig weer helemaal terug met hun ijzersterke songs, zelfs een paar nieuwe :) Stevig, zacht, lyrisch en soms bombastisch, welkom terug jongens!

Bio: Efvy is a one-person band that transforms the stage into a musical playground. Using a loop station, she builds live tracks layer by layer with guitar, bass, drums, synthesizer, and vocals, creating raw and captivating performances. Her music is driven by emotion and authenticity, drawing inspiration from artists like Tash Sultana and Billie Eilish.
AI Summary: Efvy delivers emotionally charged and authentic performances by skillfully layering guitar, bass, drums, synthesizer, and vocals through a loop station. Drawing inspiration from Tash Sultana and Billie Eilish, her music blends raw emotion with a captivating, multi-instrumental approach, creating a unique and immersive live experience.
Festival Bio (NL): Multi-instrumentalist en loop stationer EFVY speel al haar nummers in haar eentje, als een one woman army, laag voor laag opbouwend. Ze gaat ondertussen al aardig wat lokale podium af en kijkt voorzichtig al buiten de regio-grenzen. Zo staat ze straks eerst even in Tivoli (!) voor ze AE komt platspelen.

Tagline: Indie soul, woven in two tongues
Bio: Emily Wareing is a versatile singer-songwriter with a unique voice that effortlessly explores the boundaries between indie and alternative pop. Mastering both guitar and piano, her performances exude an intimate and authentic atmosphere with a mix of original songs and carefully chosen covers in both English and Dutch.
AI Summary: Emily Wareing's music blends indie and alternative pop, characterized by her unique voice and intimate performances. Her ability to master both guitar and piano allows her to create a rich, authentic sound, further enhanced by her bilingual repertoire in English and Dutch. Her artistry lies in her versatility and the emotional depth of her performances.

Bio: Alternative rock with a mythological twist.
AI Summary: Eurydice combines the raw energy of alternative rock with a unique thematic focus on mythological narratives, creating a distinctive and evocative sound that sets them apart in the genre.

Bio: Grey van Leeuwen is a 19-year-old singer-songwriter and producer from Den Helder. His music blends raw emotion with dreamy soundscapes, drawing inspiration from artists like RY X and Bon Iver. Through intimate compositions and immersive arrangements, Grey creates a unique atmosphere that resonates deeply and leaves a lasting impression.
AI Summary: Grey van Leeuwen's music is characterized by its fusion of heartfelt emotion and ethereal soundscapes, drawing clear inspiration from artists like RY X and Bon Iver. His work focuses on creating an intimate and atmospheric listening experience, showcasing a mature and evocative songwriting style for his age. His ability to craft immersive arrangements suggests a strong potential for growth and recognition in the indie and dream pop genres.

Bio: [using festival bio due to a lack of publicly available data] Singer-songwriter JULIA besloot nog maar pas geleden om onder haar eigen naam op te treden, en switchte ook nog maar net van Nederlands naar Engels. Zo gaat dat als je 20 jaar bent, volop leert aan Wisseloord Studio’s en tjokvol ambitie zit. Hou haar in de gaten!
Festival Bio (NL): Singer-songwriter JULIA besloot nog maar pas geleden om onder haar eigen naam op te treden, en switchte ook nog maar net van Nederlands naar Engels. Zo gaat dat als je 20 jaar bent, volop leert aan Wisseloord Studio’s en tjokvol ambitie zit. Hou haar in de gaten!

Bio: Krappe Sokken is a band from the Alkmaar and West Friesland region, recognized for their memorable song about the Karperton parking garage. Over time, their sound has evolved while their name—an expression from the local dialect meaning “just enough to make it work”—remains the same. In summer 2025, the band released their EP Saturday Spice, a reflection of their musical journey. Featuring five tracks with a cheerful and danceable character, the EP showcases the diverse influences each member brings during their weekly Saturday writing sessions.
AI Summary: Krappe Sokken is a Dutch band known for their unique blend of local cultural references and a cheerful, danceable sound. Their 2025 EP 'Saturday Spice' highlights their evolution and the collaborative creativity of their weekly writing sessions, incorporating diverse musical influences.
Festival Bio (NL): KRAPPE SOKKEN is natuurlijk geen nieuweling op Alkmaars Eigenste en de band heeft de afgelopen jaren Alkmaar misschien wel een beetje uitgespeeld? De uitbundige pret punk rock van het vijftal spreekt nou eenmaal enorm aan en is klaar om zijn grenzen te verleggen. Doorbreken maar!

Tagline: Gritty riffs born from the sand.
Bio: LIQUID DESERT is a rock band formed during a band night in Alkmaar. What started as a casual conversation about music quickly turned into a powerful collaboration. Cas (drums) and Duncan (bass) were searching for a new bandmate when Zilt (guitar and vocals) joined, completing the lineup. Since January 2024, the trio has been creating music together with raw energy and a passion they aim to share with every audience. Their sound reflects the gritty origins of their formation—intense, unpolished, and ready to ignite any stage.
AI Summary: Liquid Desert delivers an intense and unpolished rock sound, driven by raw energy and a passion for live performance. Formed in Alkmaar, the trio's music captures the gritty essence of their origins, blending powerful drumming, deep basslines, and emotive guitar and vocals.

Bio: Loud Wednesdays is a Dutch band rooted in the northern region of North Holland. Their music blends original folkpop compositions with covers of artists like The Jayhawks, The Shins, and Ben Harper, focusing on emotion and uncovering hidden musical gems. Known for their acoustic style, they avoid heavy electric guitars and elaborate drum setups.
AI Summary: Loud Wednesdays crafts an emotive and intimate sound by combining original folkpop songs with acoustic renditions of tracks by artists such as The Jayhawks, The Shins, and Ben Harper. Their focus on stripped-down instrumentation and emotional resonance sets them apart from more heavily produced acts, offering a refreshing and heartfelt listening experience.

Tagline: Echoes of dreams, shadows of sound
Bio: Magnoliac is a band that blends shoegaze, dream pop, and post-punk with a fresh, distinctive twist. Drawing inspiration from iconic acts like My Bloody Valentine, Slowdive, Interpol, and Joy Division, their music combines heavy, textured guitars with ethereal soundscapes and driving rhythms. Atmosphere and emotion are at the heart of their sound, ranging from introspective tracks to feel-good indie moments. Each song is crafted to maintain its own unique identity while contributing to the band’s immersive sonic palette.
AI Summary: Magnoliac crafts a distinctive sound by merging the lush textures of shoegaze and dream pop with the rhythmic intensity of post-punk. Drawing from influences like My Bloody Valentine and Joy Division, their music balances heavy, layered guitars with atmospheric soundscapes and emotional depth, creating tracks that are both introspective and uplifting.

Bio: [using festival bio due to a lack of publicly available data] MARIGOLD maakt mooie ingetogen songs met een bezetting van (contra)bas, gitaar en piano. Robin (zang, gitaar) en bassist Jeroen verruilden Alkmaar inmiddels voor Utrecht, waar ze op het conservatorium de band oprichtten, samen met pianist Rink. Maar op AE kunnen we ze laten zien en horen wat ze missen :)
Festival Bio (NL): MARIGOLD maakt mooie ingetogen songs met een bezetting van (contra)bas, gitaar en piano. Robin (zang, gitaar) en bassist Jeroen verruilden Alkmaar inmiddels voor Utrecht, waar ze op het conservatorium de band oprichtten, samen met pianist Rink. Maar op AE kunnen we ze laten zien en horen wat ze missen :)

Bio: Orchestre Partout is a Dutch music initiative founded in 2010 with the mission to connect people through the universal language of music. The organization brings together newcomers and Dutch musicians to create inclusive musical experiences. Through workshops, grassroots bands in refugee centers, professional ensembles, and collaborative projects, Orchestre Partout promotes cultural exchange and improvisation. Their activities range from intimate jams and family concerts to large-scale collaborations with renowned ensembles, all aimed at celebrating diversity and fostering creativity.
AI Summary: Orchestre Partout is a unique Dutch music initiative that blends cultural exchange and improvisation to create inclusive musical experiences. By uniting newcomers and local musicians, they foster diversity and creativity through workshops, refugee center bands, and collaborations with professional ensembles. Their focus on grassroots music-making and large-scale projects highlights their commitment to celebrating cultural diversity and the power of music as a universal language.
Festival Bio (NL): Al jaren treedt ORCHESTRE PARTOUT in wisselende bezetting op door heel Nederland. Het ensemble van nieuwkomers en nederlandse muzikanten spreekt dan de universele taal van de muziek vanuit de overtuiging dat iedere stem meetelt en klinkt. Laat je meeslepen door muziek van overal!

Tagline: Alt-pop noir with a fierce soul
Bio: Selma Peelen is an Amsterdam-based artist whose music blends alt-pop-noir with elements of folk, punk, and gothic influences. Known for her wide vocal range and emotionally charged performances, Selma crafts songs that are both fragile and powerful, often exploring themes of feminism, sexual freedom, self-discovery, and love’s complexities. Inspired by artists like PJ Harvey, Chelsea Wolfe, and Emma Ruth Rundle, her sound combines edgy lyrics with dynamic arrangements. After early releases such as Umbrellas (2008) and Crossing The Rubicon (2014), Selma returned with Like Armour in 2023 and, in 2025, released In The Boy’s Room with bandmates Iris van Huis (bass) and Sophie Neijts (drums), marking a bold new chapter in her artistic journey.
AI Summary: Blending alt-pop-noir with folk, punk, and gothic elements, Selma Peelen delivers a unique and emotionally resonant sound. Her wide vocal range and dynamic arrangements, inspired by artists like PJ Harvey and Chelsea Wolfe, amplify her exploration of themes such as feminism, self-discovery, and love. With a strong return marked by Like Armour (2023) and the collaborative In The Boy’s Room (2025), Selma demonstrates a bold evolution in her artistry.
Festival Bio (NL): De sound van SELMA PEELEN deed twee jaar terug al behoorlijk wat stof opwaaien in de kleine zaal.. Beluister vooral de gloednieuwe EP In the Boys Room: super-eigen duistere folk om langzaam in verstrikt te raken. Deze keer in de grote zaal!

Tagline: Dutch grooves, ska moves, pure joy.
Bio: Strak Plan is a four-piece Dutch band delivering a fresh take on Nederpop with a vibrant mix of reggae and danceable ska. Known for catchy lyrics, infectious grooves, and high-energy performances, they bring a modern twist to the classic sounds of the 1980s. Their repertoire includes original tracks alongside well-known sing-along favorites, ensuring every show is a lively celebration that gets the crowd moving.
AI Summary: Strak Plan stands out with their innovative fusion of Nederpop, reggae, and ska, creating a nostalgic yet modern sound inspired by the 1980s. Their energetic live shows, characterized by infectious grooves and sing-along tracks, make them a dynamic presence in the Dutch music scene.

Tagline: Indie rock with a shoegaze twist
Bio: Formerly known as NO SIGNAL, TEASE delivers fresh indie rock infused with a strong dose of shoegaze and a touch of post-punk. Their music is energetic, danceable, and experimental—a blend of styles born from throwing musical ideas into a creative blender. With this unique approach, TEASE offers a sound that feels both familiar and refreshingly new, perfect for fans of indie with an edgy twist.
AI Summary: TEASE combines indie rock with shoegaze and post-punk elements, creating an energetic and experimental sound. Their music is described as both danceable and innovative, appealing to fans of edgy and fresh indie styles.
Festival Bio (NL): Voormalig bekend als NO SIGNAL, TEASE produceert nieuwe indie rock met een goede scheut shoegaze en een vleugje postpunk. Ze gooiten muzikale ideeën in een blender om iets nieuws te creeën. Dansbare Indie-rock met een goeie scheut post-punk.

Bio: The Wildfires is a young rock band from Alkmaar, consisting of four 18-year-old passionate musicians. Drawing inspiration from 70s and 90s classic rock bands like Led Zeppelin, Jimi Hendrix, and Red Hot Chili Peppers, they have developed their own sound with screaming guitars, groovy rhythms, and swinging melodies. They were crowned winners of Popmania 2025, showcasing that classic rock is still alive and kicking.
AI Summary: The Wildfires are a vibrant young rock band from the Netherlands, blending the raw energy of 70s and 90s classic rock influences like Led Zeppelin, Jimi Hendrix, and Red Hot Chili Peppers into a fresh and dynamic sound. Their music is characterized by powerful guitar riffs, groovy rhythms, and infectious melodies, proving that classic rock can still resonate with modern audiences. Winning Popmania 2025 highlights their potential as torchbearers for the genre.
